lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Carlo Montagnese
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Carlo Montagnese
[00:17.14]I was just an only child of the universe
[00:21.35]And then I found you
[00:23.30]And then I found you
[00:25.35]You are the sun and I am just the planets
[00:29.56]Spinning around you
[00:31.62]Spinning around you
[00:33.92]You were too good to be true
[00:36.29]Gold plated
[00:38.15]But what's inside you
[00:40.16]But what's inside you
[00:42.05]I know this whole damn city thinks it needs you
[00:46.24]But not as much as I do
[00:48.28]As much as I do
[00:53.22]Cause you're the last of a dying breed
[00:55.31]Write our names in the wet concrete
[00:57.23]I wonder if your therapist knows
[00:59.92]Everything about me
[01:01.32]I'm here In search of your glory
[01:03.39]There's been a million before me
[01:05.67]That ultra kind of love
[01:08.03]You never walk away from
[01:09.83]You're just the last of the real ones
[01:13.98]You're just the last of the real ones
[01:18.17]You're just the last of the real ones
[01:22.32]You're just the last of the real ones
[01:26.41]You're just the last of the real ones
[01:32.31]I am a collapsing star with tunnel vision
[01:36.42]But only for you
[01:38.36]But only for you
[01:40.51]My head is stripped just like a screw that's been tightened too many times
[01:44.77]When I think of you
[01:46.75]When I think of you
[01:48.74]I will shield you from the waves
[01:51.20]If they find you
[01:53.14]I will protect you
[01:55.06]I will protect you
[01:57.12]Just tell me tell me tell me I am the only one
[02:01.20]Even if it's not true
[02:03.33]Even if it's not true
[02:08.41]Cause you're the last of a dying breed
[02:10.26]Write our names in the wet concrete
[02:12.25]I wonder if your therapist knows
[02:14.73]Everything about me
[02:16.36]I'm here In search of your glory
[02:18.78]There's been a million before me
[02:20.71]That ultra kind of love
[02:23.02]You never walk away from
[02:24.97]You're just the last of the real ones
[02:29.29]You're just the last of the real ones
[02:33.28]You're just the last of the real ones
[02:35.65]You're just the last of the real ones
[02:37.74]You're just the last of the real ones
[02:42.83]I'm here at the beginning of the end
[02:46.34]The end of the infinity with you
[02:50.85]I'm here at the beginning of the end
[02:55.32]The end of the infinity with you
[02:59.36]I'm done with having dreams
[03:01.60]The thing that I believe
[03:04.49]You drain all the fear from me
[03:08.04]I'm done with having dreams
[03:09.92]The thing that I believe
[03:12.14]You drain the fear from me
[03:15.06]Cause you're the last of a dying breed
[03:17.08]Write our names in the wet concrete
[03:19.11]I wonder if your therapist knows
[03:21.57]Everything about me
[03:23.07]I'm here In search of your glory
[03:25.49]There's been a million before me
[03:27.40]That ultra kind of love
[03:29.94]You never walk away from
[03:31.87]You're just the last of the real ones
[03:35.99]You're just the last of the real ones
[03:39.79]You're just the last of the real ones
[03:44.46]You're just the last of the real ones
[03:48.36]You're just the last of the real ones
tlyric:
[by:Jerome1907]
[00:17.14]我只是茫茫宇宙中的一颗小星星
[00:21.35]一直到你出现
[00:23.30]一直到你出现
[00:25.35]你是太阳，我只是行星
[00:29.56]只为了你
[00:31.62]只为了你
[00:33.92]你完美的有些不真实
[00:36.29]好像镀了金一般美好
[00:38.15]而你的内心呢
[00:40.16]你的内心呢
[00:42.05]我他妈知道你是这座城市的希望
[00:46.24]不过我更需要你
[00:48.28]更需要你
[00:53.22]因为你是唯一残存希望
[00:55.31]在未干的水泥上刻下我们的名字
[00:57.23]我不知你是否对心理医生提及过
[00:59.92]任何关于我的事情
[01:01.32]我正在寻找你的荣耀
[01:03.39]还有很多未被发现
[01:05.67]这种单纯的爱
[01:08.03]一直在你身边
[01:09.83]你就是仅存的纯真
[01:13.98]仅存的纯真
[01:18.17]仅存的纯真
[01:22.32]仅存的纯真
[01:26.41]仅存的纯真
[01:32.31]我是一颗只能看到轨道的坍缩恒星
[01:36.42]只为你一人
[01:38.36]只为你一人
[01:40.51]我要疯了就如同一颗螺丝被拧的太紧
[01:44.77]但每当我想起你
[01:46.75]但每当我想起你
[01:48.74]我愿意成为你避风港
[01:51.20]如果他们威胁到你
[01:53.14]我会庇护你
[01:55.06]我会庇护你
[01:57.12]只需告诉我：你是我的唯一
[02:01.20]即使只是个谎言
[02:03.33]即使只是个谎言
[02:08.41]因为你是唯一残存的希望
[02:10.26]在未干的水泥上刻下我们的大名
[02:12.25]我不知你是否对心理医生提及过
[02:14.73]任何有关我的事
[02:16.36]我正在寻找你的荣耀
[02:18.78]还有很多未被发现
[02:20.71]这种单纯的爱
[02:23.02]一直在你身边
[02:24.97]你就是仅存的纯真
[02:29.29]仅存的纯真
[02:33.28]仅存的纯真
[02:35.65]仅存的纯真
[02:37.74]仅存的纯真
[02:42.83]我自始至终都在你身边
[02:46.34]即使永恒我也在他的尽头等着你
[02:50.85]我自始至终都在你身边
[02:55.32]即使永恒我也会在他的尽头等着你
[02:59.36]我受够了去想那些虚幻的
[03:01.60]我曾经所信任过的梦想
[03:04.49]是你让我不再恐惧
[03:08.04]我受够了那些虚幻的
[03:09.92]我曾信任过的梦想
[03:12.14]是你让我不在恐惧
[03:15.06]只因你是残存的希望
[03:17.08]在未干的水泥上写下我们的大名
[03:19.11]我不知你是否对心理医生提起过
[03:21.57]任何有关我的事
[03:23.07]我正在寻找你的荣耀
[03:25.49]还有很多未被发现
[03:27.40]这种单纯的爱
[03:29.94]一直在你身边
[03:31.87]你是残存的希望
[03:35.99]残存的希望
[03:39.79]残存的希望
[03:44.46]残存的希望
[03:48.36]就是那残存的希望
